IUCN category 4 or 6: Indawo yokuhlala/Indawo Yokuphathwa Kwezilwane noma Indawo Evikelekile esetshenziswa ngendlela eqhubekayo
IUCN rank - special 'variable' descripti: Okuguquguqukayo; kuncike ekutheni lo msebenzi ungaphathwa ngendlela yokuthi uhambisane nezinjongo ze-MPA
IUCN rank - special no description: Ngokujwayelekile cha, igunya elinamandla ngokumelene nalo ngaphandle uma kunezimo ezikhethekile
IUCN rank - special yes description: Yebo ngoba akukho okunye okukhona, kodwa ukugunyazwa okukhethekile kubalulekile
ReportError - message part 1: Kukhona into engahambanga kahle. Sicela uvale lo mbiko bese uzama futhi.
ResultsCard - no result message: Ukuqaliswa kombiko kuqediwe, kodwa ayikho imiphumela ebuyisiwe
SizeCard - introduction: Amanzi kazwelonke asuka ogwini aye kumakhilomitha angama-200 e-nautical, aziwa ngokuthi i-Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ). Lo mbiko ufingqa ukugqama kwepulani laphesheya kwezilwandle ne-EEZ neminye imingcele engaphakathi kwayo, ukulinganisa inqubekelaphambili ekufinyeleleni okuhlosiwe okungamaphesenti omngcele ngamunye.
SizeCard - learn more:
<0> Lo mbiko ufingqa usayizi nengxenye yalolu hlelo ngaphakathi kwale mingcele.

Uma imingcele ye-MPA idlulana, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: Ayikho

Coral Card - learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: Ukubuyiselwa kwezixhobo zamakhorali kuyinqubo ehlosiwe nesebenzayo yokusiza ukutholwa nokukhiqizwa kabusha kwezixhobo zamakhorali ezilimele noma ezilimele. Kubandakanya amasu ahlukahlukene nokungenelela okuhloselwe ukukhuthaza ukukhula nokuphila kwezinhlobo zamakhorali, ukuthuthukisa ukwakheka kwezixhobo zamadwala, nokubuyisela ukusebenza kwe-ecosystem. U-7% wezixhobo zamakhorali zase-Belizean okwamanje zingaphakathi kwama-HBPZ.

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: 20% wezixhobo zamakhorali ku-HBPZs

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha yomthombo: Ikhava yama-Coral ka-2021 evela kuphrojekthi ye-Smart Coasts, lithathwe kuphrojekthi ye-GEOBON evela ku-CZMAI.

üìà Umbiko: Amaphesenti ohlobo lwesici ngasinye ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo abalwa ngokuthola ukugqagqana kohlobo lwesici ngasinye nohlelo, sifinyeze indawo yaso, bese siyahlukaniswa indawo ephelele yohlobo ngalunye lwesici esitholakala ngaphakathi kwendawo ekhethiwe yokuhlela eseduze nogu. Uma uhlelo luhlanganisa izindawo eziningi ezidlulanayo, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.
Coral Card 1: Le nqubo yokuhlela inomgomo wokukhuthaza ukukhula nokusinda kwezinhlobo zamakhorali. Lo mbiko ukhombisa inqubekelaphambili ebheke enhlosweni yama-20% ezixhobo zamakhorali ezivikelwe kakhulu.

I-Exclusive Economic Zone

Geomorphology Card - learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: Izici zaphansi zasolwandle zihlonzwe ngokusekelwe ku-geomorphology, ehlukanisa izici kusetshenziswa ukujula, ukuthambeka kolwandle, nezinye izici zemvelo.

Kudathasethi Yezici Ze-Seafloor Geomorphic, indawo yasolwandle ihlukaniswa ibe amashalofu (angashoni kakhulu ), nemithambeka, kanye kwalasha (ejule kakhulu). Lezi zici ezintathu azifani. Imigoqo, imihosha, ama-escarpments, amathafa, ukuphakama, nama-sill kwenzeka ngaphakathi kwalezi zici ezintathu.

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: Azikho izinjongo zokuhlela ezihlonziwe zezici ze-geomorphic.

<3>üó∫Ô∏è Idatha Yomthombo: Seafloor Geomorphic Imephu Yezici. <2>Harris, P.T., Macmillan-Lawler, M., Rupp, J. kanye no-Baker, E.K. 2014. I-Geomorphology yezilwandle. I-Marine Geology, 352: 4-24. <4>https://bluehabitats.org/

üìà Umbiko: Amaphesenti ohlobo lwesici ngasinye ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo abalwa ngokuthi ukuthola ukugqagqana kohlobo lwesici ngasinye nohlelo, sifinyeze indawo yaso, bese siyihlukanisa ngendawo ephelele yohlobo ngalunye lwesici esitholakala ngaphakathi kwendawo yokuhlela eseduze nogu ekhethiwe. Uma uhlelo luhlanganisa izindawo eziningi ezidlulanayo, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.
Geomorphology Card 1: Indawo engaphansi kolwandle inezici eziningi eziyingqayizivele ze-geomorphological, ngayinye idala izindawo zokuhlala ezisekela imiphakathi ehlukahlukene yemvelo. Izinhlelo kufanele ziqinisekise ukumbozwa kommeleli wohlobo ngalunye lwephansi lolwandle. Lo mbiko ufingqa iphesenti lesici ngasinye se-geomorphological esitholakala kulolu hlelo.

‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele:

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: Azikho izinjongo zokuhlela ezihlonziwe zezindawo zokuhlala.

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha yomthombo:

üìà Umbiko: Iphesenti lesici ngasinye uhlobo ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo lubalwa ngokuthola ukugqagqana kohlobo lwesici ngasinye nohlelo, sifinyeze indawo yaso, bese siyihlukanisa ngendawo ephelele yohlobo lwesici ngasinye esitholakala ngaphakathi kwendawo yokuhlela eseduze nogu ekhethiwe. Uma uhlelo luhlanganisa izindawo eziningi ezidlulanayo, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.
Habitat Card 1: Ukuvikelwa kwezindawo zokuhlala kubalulekile ekusimamiseni imiphakathi yezilwane. Lo mbiko ufingqa amaphesenti wendawo ngayinye eyinhloko etholakala kulolu hlelo.
Human Stressors Card - learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: Izinhlelo kufanele zicabangele ukuthi lezi zindawo zokusetshenziswa komuntu nengcindezi yomuntu kufanele ziqondiswe kanjani ohlelweni lolwandle.

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: Azikho izinjongo zokuhlela eziqondile zezindawo ezisetshenziswa abantu.

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha Yomthombo: 2020

üìà Umbiko: Ingqikithi yendawo yohlelo ibalwe, kanye nengqikithi yendawo engaphansi kokuvikelwa okuphezulu kanye nendawo ephelele engaphansi kokuvikelwa okuphakathi. Ukugqagqana kubalwe kanye kuphela, futhi uma izindawo zamazinga ahlukene okuvikela eqa, kubalwa kuphela ileveli yokuvikela ephezulu kakhulu.
Human Stressors Card 1: Lo mbiko ufingqa inani lemikhakha esetshenziswa abantu ehambisana nalolu hlelo. Izinhlelo kufanele zicabangele umthelela ongaba khona emikhakheni uma ukufinyelela noma imisebenzi ikhawulelwe.

IUCN Other Effective area-based Conserva: I-IUCN Ezinye Izinyathelo Ezisebenzayo Zokongiwa Kwendawo (OECM)
IUCN V. Protected Landscape or Seascape: I-IUCN V. Indawo Evikelekile noma I-Seascape
IUCN V. Protected Landscape(s) or Seasca: I-IUCN V. Indawo (s) evikelekile noma i(ama)lwandle

Littoral Forests Card - learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: Ihlathi i-Littoral likhonjwe kuqhathaniswa nedatha yango-1980 no-2019.

üéØ Inhloso Yokuhlela: I-Littoral Forest Isilinganiso e-HPZ sikhuphuke ngo-14.5% ngo-2025. Izinga le-Littoral Forest e-HPZ likhuphuke laya ku-60 % ngo-2030. Izinga le-Littoral Forest e-HPZ likhuphuke lafinyelela ku-90% ngo-2035.

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha yomthombo: Idatha ye-Littoral Forest evela e-Cherrington & Griffin (2020).

üìà Umbiko: The iphesenti lohlobo lwesici ngasinye ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo libalwa ngokuthola ukugqagqana kohlobo ngalunye lwesici nohlelo, kufingqe indawo yaso, bese ihlukaniswa ngendawo ephelele yohlobo lwesici ngasinye esitholakala ngaphakathi kwendawo yokuhlela eseduze nogu. Uma uhlelo luhlanganisa izindawo eziningi ezidlulanayo, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.
Littoral Forests Card 1: Lo mbiko ufingqa inani lamahlathi emfucumfucu ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo, ukulinganisa inqubekelaphambili ekuhlosweni kokuvikelwa okuphezulu okungama-90% kwamahlathi emfucumfucu ngo-2035.
Mangroves Card - learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: Izindawo Ezibaluleke Kakhulu Zommango ezihlonzwe ngaphansi kwemithetho ebuyekeziwe yomhlume ka-2018. Izihlahla zomhlume zihlonzwe ngokuqhathanisa idatha yango-1980 no-2019.

üéØ Injongo yokuhlela: 30% imihlume evikelwe kanye namahektha angu-4000 imihlume ebuyiselwe ngo-2035 .

üó∫Ô∏è Umthombo Wedatha: Izindawo Ezibaluleke Kakhulu Zommango kusukela kumithetho yomhlume ka-2018. Idatha ye-Mangrove and Cleared Mangrove evela e-Cherrington & Griffin (2020).

üìà Umbiko: Amaphesenti esici ngasinye uhlobo ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo lubalwa ngokuthola ukugqagqana kohlobo lwesici ngasinye nohlelo, sifinyeze indawo yaso, bese siyihlukanisa ngendawo ephelele yohlobo lwesici ngasinye esitholakala ngaphakathi kwendawo yokuhlela eseduze nogu ekhethiwe. Uma uhlelo luhlanganisa izindawo eziningi ezidlulanayo, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.
Mangroves Card 1: Lo mbiko ufingqa inani lemihlume ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo, ulinganisa inqubekelaphambili ekuhlosweni kwe-30x30 yokuvikelwa komhlume okungama-30%.
of the Belize Ocean Space in High Protec: yeBelize Ocean Space in High Protection Biodiversity Zones
Priority mangrove areas and cleared mang: Izindawo zomhlume eziphambili kanye nezindawo zomhlume ezigawuliwe zihlonziwe. Ithebula elilandelayo lifingqa ukugqagqana kwalolu hlelo nalezo zindawo.
Protection Card - Learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: Le nqubo yokuhlela isebenzisa uhlaka lwe-IUCN lwezinga lokuvikela:

I-IUCN Ia Indawo yokulondoloza imvelo eqinile: Ivikelwe ngokuqinile ezinhlobonhlobo zezinto eziphilayo kanye nezici ngokunokwenzeka ze-geological/ geomorphological, lapho ukuvakashelwa komuntu, ukusetshenziswa kanye nomthelela kulawulwa futhi kukhawulelwe ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuvikelwa kwamanani okongiwa kwemvelo

I-IUCN Ib Wilderness indawo: Imvamisa izindawo ezinkulu ezingalungiswanga noma eziguquliwe, ezigcina isimo sazo semvelo nomthelela, ngaphandle kwendawo yokuhlala abantu unomphela noma ebalulekile, evikelwe futhi elawulwa ukulondoloza isimo semvelo

I-IUCN II National Park: Izindawo ezinkulu zemvelo noma eziseduze nemvelo ezivikela izinqubo ezinkulu zemvelo ezinezinhlobo zemvelo kanye ne-ecosystem, nazo ezinamathuba angokomoya, ezesayensi, ezemfundo, ezokungcebeleka kanye nezivakashi ahambisana nemvelo namasiko.

I-IUCN III Itshe lesikhumbuzo noma isici semvelo: Izindawo ezibekelwe eceleni ukuze kuvikelwe itshe lesikhumbuzo lemvelo elithile, okungaba isimo sezwe, intaba yolwandle, umhume wasolwandle, isici sokwakheka komhlaba esifana nomgede, noma isici se-pving ihlathi lasendulo

I-IUCN IV Indawo yokuphatha/indawo yokuphatha izinhlobo zezilwane: Izindawo zokuvikela izinhlobo ezithile zezilwane noma izindawo zokuhlala, lapho ukuphathwa kukhombisa lokhu kuqala. Abaningi bazodinga ukungenelela okuvamile, okusebenzayo ukuze bahlangabezane nezidingo zezinhlobo ezithile zezilwane noma izindawo zokuhlala, kodwa lokhu akuyona imfuneko yesigaba

IUCN V Indawo evikelekile noma isimo solwandle: Lapho ukusebenzelana kwabantu nemvelo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuye kwaba khona. ikhiqize umlingiswa ohlukile onenani elibalulekile lemvelo, imvelo, amasiko kanye nemvelo: futhi lapho ukuvikela ubuqotho balokhu kusebenzisana kubalulekile ekuvikeleni nasekusimamiseni indawo kanye nokongiwa kwayo kwemvelo okuhlobene namanye amanani

IUCN VI Izindawo ezivikelwe ngokusetshenziswa okusimeme kwemithombo yemvelo: Izindawo ezigcina imvelo, kanye namagugu amasiko ahlobene kanye nezinhlelo zendabuko zokulawulwa kwemithombo yemvelo. Ngokuvamile, okukhulu, ikakhulukazi esimweni semvelo, nengxenye engaphansi kokuphathwa kwemithombo yemvelo esimeme nalapho ukusetshenziswa kwemithombo yemvelo okungezona ezezimboni okusezingeni eliphansi okuhambisana nokongiwa kwemvelo kubonakala njengenye yezinjongo eziyinhloko

IUCN Okunye Okuphumelelayo Area-based Conservation Measures (OECM): Indawo echazwe ngokwezwe ngaphandle kweNdawo Evikelekile, elawulwa futhi elawulwa ngezindlela ezifinyelela imiphumela emihle neqhubekayo yesikhathi eside yokongiwa kwemvelo kwe-in situ, nemisebenzi ehlobene ne-ecosystem kanye nezinsizakalo kanye lapho amanani afaneleka khona, amasiko, ngokomoya, ezenhlaloezomnotho, namanye abalulekile endaweni (CBD, 2018).

Izindawo Zasolwandle Eziphethwe Endaweni (LMMA)

IUCN Ia, Ib, ne-II zithathwa njengeziNdawo Zokuvikelwa Kwezinto Ezinhlobonhlobo Eziphakeme (ama-HBPZ). I-IUCN V, VI, OECM, kanye ne-LMMAs zithathwa njenge-Medium Biodiversity Protection Zones (MBPZs). Kule mibiko, amazinga e-IUCN III kanye ne-IV nawo athathwa njenge-MBPZ.

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: Ayikho

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha yomthombo: Ayikho

üìà Umbiko: Imane ibala inombolo yezindawo kuleveli ngayinye yokuvikela.
Seagrass Card - learn more:
üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: Ayikho inhloso ethile yokuhlela yotshani basolwandle.

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha Yomthombo: ?

üìà Umbiko: Amaphesenti ohlobo lwesici ngasinye ngaphakathi kwalolu hlelo abalwa ngokuthola ukugqagqana kohlobo ngalunye lwesici nohlelo, lufinyeze indawo yalo, bese luyihlukanisa ngendawo ephelele yohlobo lwesici ngasinye esitholakala ngaphakathi kwendawo yokuhlela eseduze nogu ekhethiwe. Uma uhlelo luhlanganisa izindawo eziningi ezidlulanayo, ukugqagqana kubalwa kanye kuphela.
Seagrass Card 1: Imibhede yotshani basolwandle iyisimiso esibalulekile sezinto eziphilayo zasolwandle, ehlinzeka ngokudla nendawo yokuhlala ezilwaneni eziningi zasolwandle. Lo mbiko ukhombisa ingqikithi yendawo yotshani basolwandle evikelwe yilolu hlelo.
Size Card - Learn more:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Uhlolojikelele: I-Belize Ocean Space iqukethe izindawo ezintathu zasolwandle:

(1) Amanzi angaphakathi: Noma iyiphi indawo yamanzi esohlangothini olumaphakathi nezwe lwesisekelo sendawo yolwandle.

< p>(2) Izilwandle ze-territorial: Zihlanganisa lezo zindawo zolwandle, njengemikhawulo yazo yangaphakathi, isisekelo solwandle lwendawo futhi, njengemikhawulo yazo yangaphandle, umugqa okalwa ukusuka kuleyo sisekelo, yonke indawo okungamamayela ayi-12 ukusuka emanzini. indawo eseduze yaleso sisekelo.

(3) I-Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ): Ihlanganisa lezo zindawo zolwandle ezingale futhi ezincikene nolwandle olunomkhawulo wangaphandle, umugqa okalwe. ngasolwandle ukusuka esisekelweni solwandle indawo ngayinye eqhele ngamamayela angu-200 ukusuka endaweni eseduze yaleyo sisekelo.

Izindawo eziphakeme zokuvikela ukuhlukahluka kwemvelo zilondoloza futhi zivikele izindawo ezibaluleke kakhulu ezinhlobonhlobo zezinto eziphilayo zasolwandle nasogwini. Lezi zindawo zikhethelwe izindawo zokuhlala nezinhlobo ezingase zibe yivelakancane, zibe sengcupheni yokushabalala, ezihlukile noma ezinobubanzi obuncane bokusabalalisa. Le ndawo ihlanganisa izindawo zokuzalela noma ezizalela kuzo, indawo yokuhlala ebalulekile yokudla, izilwane ezibuthakathaka noma ezibucayi kanye nezindawo zokuhlala, kanye nezindawo ezibalulekile emhlabeni jikelele. Uma zihlangene, lezi zindawo zihlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala kanye nezinhlobo zezinto eziphilayo ngokuvikelwa isikhathi eside, futhi zinkulu ngokwanele ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukusimama kwemvelo nokuvumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu. Lesi sigaba sendawo asifanele ukunwetshwa noma ukuguqulwa kombhede wasolwandle futhi sithathwa njengendawo yokungathathwa ngolimi oluvamile. Izibonelo zesimo sokuvikelwa okuphezulu, kuye ngezinjongo nemisebenzi yabantu evumelekile, yilezi: Izindawo Zasolwandle Ezivikelwe ezigabeni ze-IUCN i-Ia, Ib, kanye ne-II.

Ukuvikelwa kwezinhlobonhlobo zemvelo okumaphakathi kanye nezindawo zokusebenzisa okusimeme kuhlongozwa ukuze kongiwe izindawo. ezilungele amazinga aphakathi nendawo okuvikelwa kwezinhlobonhlobo zemvelo futhi ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa okuthile okusimeme. Lezi zindawo zihlanganisa izindawo zokuhlala nezilwane ezikwazi ukubekezelela ukuphazamiseka nemisebenzi yabantu. Lezi zindawo zibandakanya izindawo ezibalulekile zesifunda nezikazwelonke. Lesi sigaba sezoni sifanele izinga elithile lokumba kanye nokushintshwa kombhede wasolwandle, ngokuphathwa ngendlela efanele kanye nesiqondiso, kuye ngokuthi inhloso yendawo ngayinye ebekiwe. Izibonelo zesimo sokuvikela esimaphakathi zingabandakanya: Indawo Evikelekile Yasolwandle I-IUCN izigaba V no-VI, isigaba se-IUCN OECM, Nezindawo Zasolwandle Eziphethwe Ngokwendawo (LMMA). Kule mibiko, amazinga e-IUCN III kanye ne-IV nawo abhekwa njenge-MBPZ.

üéØ Inhloso yokuhlela: 30% ukuvikelwa kwe-Belize Ocean Space. Ukuvikelwa okungu-15% kuma-HPBZ. Ukuvikelwa okungu-15% kuma-MPBZ.

üó∫Ô∏è Idatha Yomthombo: Belize EEZ

üìà Umbiko: Ingqikithi yendawo yohlelo ibaliwe, kanye nengqikithi yendawo engaphansi kokuvikelwa okuphezulu kanye nendawo ephelele ngaphansi ukuvikelwa okuphakathi. Ukugqagqana kubalwe kanye kuphela, futhi uma izindawo zamazinga ahlukene okuvikela eqa, kubalwa kuphela ileveli yokuvikela ephezulu.
SizeCard - Intro: I-Belize Ocean Space ihlanganisa amanzi angaphakathi, ulwandle lwezindawo, kanye ne-Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) enabela kumamayela angama-200 we-nautical. Lo mbiko ufingqa ukugqagqana kwalolu hlelo nendawo yonke yolwandle, ukulinganisa inqubekelaphambili ekufinyeleleni umgomo wokuvikela okungu-30%.
This plan meets the objective of highly: Lolu hlelo luhlangabezana nenhloso yokuvikela okuphezulu
